categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: T-38 was a GR-75 medium transport used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, T-38, along with T-37 and T-39, carried wounded survivors of the Imperial attack on the Hormuuz facility near Gelgelar to the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Redemption.
